channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Biden Defines Low Energy in Campaign Meeting, Gets Confused About Candidates - They Don't Seem Impressed
Arkansas cannot prevent 2 teachers from discussing critical race theory in classroom, judge rules
item.description: U.S. District Judge Lee Rudofsky has ruled 2 Arkansas high school teachers cannot be prevented by the state from discussing critical race theory in their classrooms.

item.title: Biden Administration to Unveil New Asylum Rule
item.description: The Biden administration plans to unveil new changes to the asylum system Thursday, including expediting the expulsion of migrants who officials consider national security or public safety risks, according to media reports.

item.title: Florida School Shuts Down Christian Club After Complaint From Rabid Atheist Zealots
House antisemitism hearing: NYC schools leader reveals case that has 'troubled' him the most
item.description: New York City Public Schools Chancellor David Banks on Wednesday told lawmakers there have been 281 reported antisemitic and Islamophobic incidents within his school system since Oct. 7.

item.title: Reps. Jordan, Comer Refer Ex-Trump Atty. Cohen to DOJ
item.description: Two high-ranking Republican members of Congress have referred the former attorney for Donald Trump to the Department of Justice on the grounds of perjury and knowingly making false statements to Congress.

item.title: RedState Sports Report: It’s May, So Let’s Look at the NFL
Stefanik grills NYC schools chief on pro-Hamas teacher kept on payroll after antisemitic riot
item.description: Rep. Elise Stefanik, R-N.Y., blasted New York City Public Schools Chancellor David Banks over the former Hillcrest High School principal's employment status after an antisemitic riot.

item.title: Sen. Graham Slams Biden Admin. For Pausing Israeli Aid
item.description: Sen. Lindsey Graham, R-S.C., slammed the Biden administration Wednesday for pausing Israeli military aid over concerns that the country is planning to launch a full-scale assault in the southern Gaza city of Rafah.

item.title: NAACP Asks Biden to Pardon Marilyn Mosby, Says Baltimore DA Case Was 'Malicious Persecution' by Trump DOJ
WATCH: Dem governor swarmed by anti-Israel agitators while celebrating daughter's college graduation
item.description: Video captured anti-Israel protesters swarming Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer as she celebrated her daughter's college graduation at a local restaurant.

item.title: Republicans Seek to Change Census, Reap Benefits
item.description: A bill being considered in the House this week would add a citizenship question to future census counts could have big implications.

item.title: WaPo Gushes for Brittany Griner As She Plays Victim And Plays Her "Donald Trump" Card
Fox News Politics: Literal Brain Worms
item.description: The latest updates from the 2024 campaign trail, exclusive interviews and more Fox News politics content

item.title: Biden Set to Tighten Asylum Access at US-Mexico Border
item.description: The Biden administration is set to tighten access to asylum at the U.S.-Mexico border via a new regulation that could be issued as soon as Thursday, three sources familiar with the matter said, in a targeted move aimed at reducing illegal crossings.The regulation would...
